# verifyMfa

Verifies a newly created MFA factor to complete the setup process.

## Import

```ts
import { BaseSignerClient } from "@account-kit/signer";
```

## Parameters

### params

`VerifyMfaParams`
The parameters required to verify the MFA factor

## Returns

`Promise<void>`
A promise that resolves when verification is complete
